videos.title: مقدمة عن دورة الاختبارات الاحادية Clean Cod |  Unit Tests

1. Clean code and bad code

3. Meaningful Names
4. Functions
5. Comments
6. Formatting
7. Classes, Objects, and Data Structures
8. Writing Clean Functions
9. Exception Handling
10. Unit Testing
11. Threading and Concurrency
12. Using Tools to Improve Code Quality
13. Refactoring Code
14. Implementing Design Patterns

videos.title: 78. الوظائف الفاحصة للأخطاء Exception
videos.description:
دورة تعليمية شاملة عن كيفية كتابة شفرة نظيفة
#cleancode 

المواضيع الرئيسة للدورة:
1. Clean code and bad code
2. Code Review – Process and Importance
3. Meaningful Names
4. Functions
5. Comments
6. Formatting
7. Classes, Objects, and Data Structures
8. Writing Clean Functions
9. Exception Handling
10. Unit Testing
11. Threading and Concurrency
12. Using Tools to Improve Code Quality
13. Refactoring Code
14. Implementing Design Patterns
.......................

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLhiFu-f80eo_w3c35Fr0tlFQ1keyaNXBO
........................
